answers.answer: There are two recent studies that look at lower BMI patients with type II diabetes and sleeve gastrectomies that look promising. My understanding of the current requirements for medical necessity are a BMI of 30 or greater with 2 co-mordidities. That means you could be no taller than 4' 9" to be over this BMI with a sustained weight of 140 pounds.

title: gastric sleeve or SOMETHING
